LanguageData.Broadshield.label: broadshield
LanguageData.Broadshield.description: A temporary bullet shield projector. Bullets can go out, but not in. It burns out after a few seconds of use.
LanguageData.Shuttle.label: シャトル
LanguageData.Shuttle.description: 地表と軌道間、ないしは惑星系の衛星間の輸送を行うために設計されたスペーサー技術のシャトル。
LanguageData.ShuttleCrashed.label: crashed shuttle
LanguageData.ShuttleCrashed.description: A spacer-tech shuttle designed for transit between surface and orbit, or between moons of a planetary system.
